description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争时期由国立清华大学、国立北京大学和私立南开大学在云南昆明联合组成的大学，前身为国立长沙临时大学。
description.en: A university formed during the Second Sino-Japanese War by the union of National Tsinghua University, National Peking University, and the private Nankai University in Kunming, Yunnan. Its predecessor was the National Temporary University of Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名高等学府，国立西南联合大学的三个组成部分之一。
description.en: A renowned Chinese institution of higher learning, one of the three constituent universities of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名高等学府，国立西南联合大学的三个组成部分之一。
description.en: A renowned Chinese institution of higher learning, one of the three constituent universities of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名高等学府，国立西南联合大学的三个组成部分之一。
description.en: A renowned Chinese institution of higher learning, one of the three constituent universities of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪中期中国抵抗大日本帝国侵略的全面战争。这场战争导致了华北多所大学内迁，并促成了国立西南联合大学的成立。
description.en: A full-scale war fought in the mid-20th century between China and the Empire of Japan. This war led to the relocation of many universities from North China and the establishment of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 由国立清华大学、国立北京大学和南开大学于1937年在长沙联合组建的临时大学，为国立西南联合大学的前身。
description.en: A temporary university established in Changsha in 1937 by the union of National Tsinghua University, National Peking University, and Nankai University. It was the predecessor of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，曾任国立清华大学校长，并在国立西南联合大学时期长期担任常务委员会主席，主导校务。
description.en: A Chinese educator who served as the president of National Tsinghua University and chaired the Standing Committee of the National Southwestern Associated University for a long period, directing its affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，曾任国立北京大学校长，为国立西南联合大学常务委员会委员。
description.en: A Chinese educator who served as the president of National Peking University and was a member of the Standing Committee of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，南开大学创办人，为国立西南联合大学常务委员会委员。
description.en: A Chinese educator, founder of Nankai University, and a member of the Standing Committee of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 国立西南联合大学解散后，由其师范学院留昆独立办学而成立的学院，后更名为云南师范大学。
description.en: After the dissolution of the National Southwestern Associated University, this college was established independently from its Normal College which remained in Kunming. It was later renamed Yunnan Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 由国立昆明师范学院更名而来的大学，继承了国立西南联合大学的校址和部分历史。
description.en: A university renamed from the National Kunming Teachers College, inheriting the campus and part of the history of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国抗日战争全面爆发的事件，直接导致了华北高校的南迁。
description.en: An event that marked the full-scale outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, directly leading to the southward relocation of universities in North China.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪上半叶的东亚帝国，其对中国的侵略是国立西南联合大学成立的直接原因。
description.en: An East Asian empire in the first half of the 20th century, whose invasion of China was the direct cause for the establishment of the National Southwestern Associated University.

en: Ministry of Education of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期负责教育事务的最高行政机关，曾下令国立大学南迁和再次迁徙。
description.en: The highest administrative body for educational affairs during the Republic of China period, which ordered the southward and subsequent relocations of national universities.

description.zh-cn: 中国云南省的省会，国立西南联合大学的主要办学地点。
description.en: The capital city of Yunnan Province, China, and the main location of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，在国立长沙临时大学迁往昆明期间，担任步行穿越湘西、贵州、滇东的学生旅行团团长。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the National Revolutionary Army who served as the leader of the student trekking group that walked through western Hunan, Guizhou, and eastern Yunnan during the relocation of the National Temporary University of Changsha to Kunming.

description.zh-cn: 位于昆明的大学，在抗日战争时期与国立西南联合大学关系密切，共享学者资源并共同举办活动。
description.en: A university in Kunming that had close ties with the National Southwestern Associated University during the Second Sino-Japanese War, sharing scholars and co-hosting activities.

description.zh-cn: 中国社会学家、人类学家，抗日战争时期曾在国立西南联合大学与云南大学两校兼职。
description.en: A Chinese sociologist and anthropologist who held concurrent positions at both the National Southwestern Associated University and Yunnan University during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治学家，抗日战争时期曾在国立西南联合大学与云南大学两校兼职。
description.en: A Chinese political scientist who held concurrent positions at both the National Southwestern Associated University and Yunnan University during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国哲学家，曾任国立西南联合大学文学院院长，并参与创作了联大校歌。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher who served as the Dean of the College of Arts at the National Southwestern Associated University and co-authored its school anthem.

description.zh-cn: 中国文学家，国立西南联合大学教授，与冯友兰共同为联大校歌作词。
description.en: A Chinese literary scholar and professor at the National Southwestern Associated University who co-authored the lyrics for the university anthem with Feng Youlan.

description.zh-cn: 中国语言学家，为国立西南联合大学校歌作曲。
description.en: A Chinese linguist who composed the music for the National Southwestern Associated University anthem.

nodes.id: 国立西南联合大学校歌

zh-cn: 国立西南联合大学校歌
en: Anthem of National Southwestern Associated University

description.zh-cn: 国立西南联合大学的校歌，词牌为《满江红》，由罗庸、冯友兰作词，张清常作曲。
description.en: The school anthem of the National Southwestern Associated University, set to the tune of 'Man Jiang Hong', with lyrics by Luo Yong and Feng Youlan, and music by Zhang Qingchang.

description.zh-cn: 物理学家，诺贝尔物理学奖得主，国立西南联合大学校友。
description.en: Physicist and Nobel laureate in Physics, an alumnus of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 物理学家，诺贝尔物理学奖得主，国立西南联合大学校友。
description.en: Physicist and Nobel laureate in Physics, an alumnus of the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 数学家，被誉为“微分几何之父”，曾在国立西南联合大学任教。
description.en: Mathematician, known as the 'Father of Differential Geometry', who taught at the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国诗人、学者，国立西南联合大学教授。
description.en: A Chinese poet and scholar, who was a professor at the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国散文家、诗人，国立西南联合大学教授。
description.en: A Chinese essayist and poet, who was a professor at the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国数学家，国立西南联合大学教授。
description.en: A Chinese mathematician, who was a professor at the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，曾任国立西南联合大学理学院院长。
description.en: A Chinese physicist, who served as the Dean of the College of Science at the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，曾任国立西南联合大学理学院院长。
description.en: A Chinese physicist, who served as the Dean of the College of Science at the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、古典文学研究家，国立西南联合大学教授。
description.en: A Chinese historian and classical literature researcher, who was a professor at the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家，国立西南联合大学教授。
description.en: A Chinese writer, who was a professor at the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家，国立西南联合大学教授。
description.en: A Chinese historian, who was a professor at the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争的爆发导致华北高校南迁，最终在昆明组建了国立西南联合大学。
description.en: The outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War led to the southward relocation of universities from North China, eventually resulting in the formation of the National Southwestern Associated University in Kunming.

description.zh-cn: 国立清华大学是组成国立西南联合大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: National Tsinghua University was one of the three universities that formed the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 国立北京大学是组成国立西南联合大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: National Peking University was one of the three universities that formed the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 南开大学是组成国立西南联合大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: Nankai University was one of the three universities that formed the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 国立长沙临时大学因战局紧张迁往昆明，并更名为国立西南联合大学。
description.en: Due to the escalating war situation, the National Temporary University of Changsha relocated to Kunming and was renamed the National Southwestern Associated University.

description.zh-cn: 国立清华大学是组成国立长沙临时大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: National Tsinghua University was one of the three universities that formed the National Temporary University of Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 国立北京大学是组成国立长沙临时大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: National Peking University was one of the three universities that formed the National Temporary University of Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 南开大学是组成国立长沙临时大学的三所大学之一。
description.en: Nankai University was one of the three universities that formed the National Temporary University of Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 梅贻琦长期担任常务委员会主席，主导校务。
description.en: Mei Yiqi served as the long-term Chairman of the Standing Committee, directing the university's affairs.

description.zh-cn: 国立西南联合大学解散后，其师范学院留在昆明，独立设院为国立昆明师范学院。
description.en: After the dissolution of the National Southwestern Associated University, its Normal College remained in Kunming and was independently established as the National Kunming Teachers College.

description.zh-cn: 国立昆明师范学院于1984年更名为云南师范大学。
description.en: The National Kunming Teachers College was renamed Yunnan Normal University in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 七七事变标志着中国抗日战争的全面爆发。
description.en: The Marco Polo Bridge Incident marked the full-scale outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 1937年7月29日，南开大学校园遭到日军轰炸，校舍被付之一炬。
description.en: On July 29, 1937, the Nankai University campus was bombed by the Japanese army and its buildings were destroyed.

description.zh-cn: 作为国立大学，西南联大需听从教育部的指令，如奉命迁校。
description.en: As a national university, the National Southwestern Associated University was under the direction of the Ministry of Education, such as receiving orders to relocate.

position.en: Leader of the student trekking group

description.zh-cn: 在国立长沙临时大学迁往昆明期间，担任步行学生旅行团的团长。
description.en: During the relocation of the National Temporary University of Changsha to Kunming, he served as the leader of the student trekking group.

description.zh-cn: 两校在昆明为邻，许多学者在两校兼职，师生也共同参加活动。
description.en: The two universities were neighbors in Kunming, with many scholars holding concurrent positions and students and faculty participating in joint activities.

description.en: Authored the lyrics for the school anthem.

description.en: Authored the lyrics for the school anthem.

description.en: Composed the music for the school anthem.

Dean of the College of Science
Dean of the College of Science
